issue.title: Python: Provide infrastructure for manylinux1 wheels
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-191](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-191). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
After carefully reading the spec, we actually should be able to build manylinux1 compatiable pyarrow wheels (and then upload them to PyPI).

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-191?focusedCommentId=15340265) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
There is a script to build Feather for manylinux1 by `[~ogrisel]` https://github.com/matthew-brett/manylinux-builds/blob/master/build_feathers.sh which should provide some starting point to get pyarrow builds.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-191?focusedCommentId=15580482) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 173
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/173>
